definition[0]: (1981-) a US R&B singer and actress who was born in Atlanta, Georgia. She was a member of the highly successful girl group Destiny’s Child, with Beyoncé Knowles, until the group stopped working together in 2006. Kelly’s successful songs include Dilemma (2002) (with Nelly) and Motivation (2011) (with Lil Wayne). She has appeared in several films and television series, and in 2011 became one of the judges on the UK television talent show The X Factor. Her full name is Kelendria Rowland
